## üì° API Endpoints (All Users)

All tokens work with these endpoints:

### HTTP (No SSL):
```
http://localhost:8280/api/forex/1.0.0/health
http://localhost:8280/api/payment/1.0.0/health
http://localhost:8280/api/ledger/1.0.0/health
http://localhost:8280/api/profile/1.0.0/health
http://localhost:8280/api/wallet/1.0.0/health
http://localhost:8280/api/rules/1.0.0/health
```

### HTTPS (Secure):
```
https://localhost:8243/api/forex/1.0.0/health
https://localhost:8243/api/payment/1.0.0/health
https://localhost:8243/api/ledger/1.0.0/health
https://localhost:8243/api/profile/1.0.0/health
https://localhost:8243/api/wallet/1.0.0/health
https://localhost:8243/api/rules/1.0.0/health
```

---

## üîÑ Generate New Tokens

When tokens expire (after 60 minutes), run:

```bash
./generate-all-tokens.sh
```

This will regenerate tokens for all 5 users.

---

## ‚úÖ Token Details

- **Issuer:** WSO2 Identity Server (https://wso2is:9443/oauth2/token)
- **Type:** JWT (JSON Web Token)
- **Grant Type:** Password Grant
- **Lifetime:** 3600 seconds (60 minutes)
- **Algorithm:** RS256

---

**All tokens are active and ready for Postman testing!** üöÄ
